mapper.select: SELECT e.employee_id empId, e.employee_active empActive, ed.employee_name empName, ed.employee_phone empPhone, ed.employee_email empEmail, ed.employee_gender empGender, ed.createdate createdate, ed.updatedate updatedate, ei.employee_img_file_name FROM employee e INNER JOIN employee_detail ed ON ed.employee_no = e.employee_no INNER JOIN employee_img ei ON ei.employee_no = e.employee_no
